traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Goblins reach adulthood at age 8 and live up to 60 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Goblins are typically neutral evil, as they care only for their own needs. A few goblins might tend toward good or neutrality, but only rarely.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Goblins are between 3 and 4 feet tall and weigh between 40 and 80 pounds. Your size is Small.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Fury of the Small
traits.description: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature's size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.description: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.
